content: wavy blanket materials worsted weight yarn -- red white blue version -- -- pink brown white green version -- berroco comfort 210 yards/skein cascade luna 82 yards/skein a - 2 skeins - color 9755 red 4 skeins - china pink 709 b - 2 skeins - color 9807 natural/undyed 4 skeins - chocolate 705 c - 2 skeins - color 9703 denim/blue 4 skeins - white 701 4 skeins - oxide green size i 5 5mm hook tapestry needle scissors gauge not too tight not too loose measurements 42 x 35 in or until desired length is achieved notes the blanket measurements above are for a crib sized blanket for a wider blanket begin with chaining 135 and then add on stitches in multiples of 12 instructions with color a chain 135 includes turning chain turn row 1 set-up row - begin next stitch in the second stitch from the hook - 2 single_crochet *2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet* - repeat from * to * to end of row row 2 - 3 - with color b chain 3 - begin next stitch in the fifth chain from the hook the chain 3 counts as the first stitch - 1 treble_crochet *2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet* - repeat from * to * to end of row - note remember to chain 3 when starting row 3 row 4 - 5 - with color c chain 1 - begin next stitch in the 2nd stitch/space from hook - 2 single_crochet *2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet* - repeat from * to * to end of row - note remember to chain 1 when starting row 5 continue working row 2 through 5 until desired length is reached last row - with color a chain 3 - begin next stitch in the fifth chain from the hook the chain 3 counts as the first stitch - 1 treble_crochet *2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet* - repeat from * to * to end of row finish off weave in ends © 2007 stephanie gage all rights reserved www stephaniegage com
